aboutUsPage.title: BitTube Browser Extension
aboutUsPage.text1: BitTube browser extension implements a monetisation model called AirTime℠ into the browsing activity. It rewards website owners and visitors with cryptocurrency called TUBE. Additionally, its functions can be used for donations and transfer of value.
aboutUsPage.text2: After enabling the extension users can see their overall spent time on the Internet. Depending on how much time they spend on a particular website the underlying system monetises the webpages or the user account in cases the visited website is a social network.
aboutUsPage.text3: The extension’s adblocker removes website banners and tracking activity.
aboutUsPage.features1: Rewards your time spent on the Internet.
aboutUsPage.features3: Donate to websites and social media accounts.
aboutUsPage.features4: Link with your social accounts and website.
aboutUsPage.features5: Send TUBE cryptocurrency to other BitTube users.
aboutUsPage.features7: Buy TUBE coins with a Debit/Credit card or PayPal.
aboutUsPage.features8: Analyze statistics about your browsing history.
aboutUsPage.features9: Check all of your transaction history.
aboutUsPage.features10: Block ads, banners, popups and large media files.
aboutUsPage.features13: Earn TUBEs by sharing a personal referral link.
aboutUsPage.airTimeModelText: A network system that rewards Internet users with cryptocurrency called TUBE for their time spent on the Internet.
aboutUsPage.airtimeText: The total amount of time spent on the Internet with the browser extension enabled.
aboutUsPage.walletAddressText: A unique address that identifies where it sits on the blockchain. It’s the location at which the coin’s ownership data is stored and where any changes are registered when a transaction is sent or received. It is also known as Public Key.
aboutUsPage.privateKeyText: A string of numbers and letters that are used to access your wallet. While your wallet is represented by a public key, the private key is the password you should protect, as it acts as your digital signature.
aboutUsPage.viewWalletText: Only TUBE balance can be seen or it can be used to receive payments. Sending funds is disabled.
aboutUsPage.viewKeyText: A string of numbers and letters that are used to access your view only wallet.
aboutUsPage.confirmationText: When a BitTube transaction takes place, the blockchain confirms the transaction’s validity. The confirmation is done by the network every 120 seconds. The transaction is confirmed after at least 10 confirmations.
aboutUsPage.bitTubeBrowser: BitTube browser extension is developed by BitTube.

toContinueDonation: To continue with the donation process you need to verify your phone number.

orderTransferText:
Your order has been created successfully.
Please note that bank transfers can take 3 or more working days to process. We will cancel your order after 7 days of non-payment.

airtimeStats: Your AirTime stats get updated every 24 hours.
airtimeStatsReward: Rewards are paid out 3 days after they appear here.
step1buytubes: 1. Order the amount you want to buy
step2buytubes: 2. Make a bank transfer using the provided data after creating the order.

convertTUBEsText: In order to convert your TUBEs directly to local currency, enter your bank account details here.
verifyBankText: To verify your bank account, we will send you the equivalent of 0.01 USD. The transaction contains a code that you need to enter on the next page.
codeBankTransfer: To verify your bank account, we will verify your data and we will send to you an email that contains a code composed as TUBE-XXXXXX. Please type the code here.
importantBankInfo: Important! A bank transfer fee will be deducted from that amount! International transfers can take up to 7 days!

modifyBankAccountInfo: If modified, you will need to verify the account again.
transactionWithdrawal: Your transaction to withdraw has been successfully sent.
transactionErrorText: An error has ocurred and the transaction has not been sent.
vpnSubscriptionText: Using the VPN service will be funded from your daily AirTime reward, proportional to the time the service was used during that day.

vpnInfoTitle: Keep in mind that changing your country ID may make some websites or apps behave differently. The VPN service will be funded from your daily AirTime reward

uploadSelfie1: Please upload a selfie holding your national ID or passport.
uploadSelfie2: Take a selfie and ensure that nothing is blocking the full view of your face.
uploadSelfie3: Do not use a professional profile picture.
uploadSelfie4: Do not manipulate the image of your identification in any way, including the addition of watermarks or obscuring certain information.

completeOrder: To complete your order please fill out the following data.
registerModuleIntro: The AirTime module rewards you based on the session times from non-BitTube guest visitors and BitTube users alike.
registerModuleIntro2: Register your platform (website, app, etc) with the AirTime module here.

noteRegisterPlatform: Note: The counted AirTime you receive from BitTube users is much higher compared to guests. You are encouraged to invite your visitors into the BitTube ecosystem to maximize your earnings.

feature1: - Deposit and withdraw digital assets (Convert my TUBEs feature).
